share_definition: Medlemmar % av folkm√§ngden (Church of Sweden membership share)
notes: Model: dy/dt = beta(t)*y*(1-y) - rho(t)*y. Piecewise: beta and rho change at 2000. 52 observation points (1981 excluded). Initial value y(0) = observed share at 1972.
Model: dy/dt = beta(t)*y*(1-y/K) - rho(t)*y with fitted K=0.000120. 11 observation points from Service Year Report tables. Initial value y(0) = observed share at 2014.
Model: dy/dt = beta(t)*y*(1-y) - rho(t)*y. Piecewise breakpoint selected via grid search from {2006
column21: 2018}. 5 census observation points. Initial value y(0) = observed share at 2001. Share = (No religion count) / (Total people stated).
